title: Down there = alli abajo (Spanish version)
brief_description: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. Presents information about reproduction, preventative health care and contraception.
